data.text:
New bettors in Pennsylvania can start locking up bonuses with bet365 PA bonus code PITTSXLM. This is an opportunity for players to win bonuses on the NFL’s Hall of Fame Game or any other matchup. Click here for a sportsbook bonus or use this link to unlock a casino offer.

Redeem bet365 PA bonus code PITTSXLM and choose one of two great sign-up bonuses. Bettors can bet $5 on any game to win $150 in bonuses and 50 free casino spins. On the other hand, players can opt for a casino deposit match of up to $500 and 100 free casino spins.

Although it’s only the preseason, the NFL is officially back. The Chicago Bears and Houston Texans will meet in the Hall of Fame Game on Thursday night. Sign up with bet365 Sportsbook and start claiming these bonuses.

Click here to use bet365 PA bonus code PITTSXLM for a $150 bonus and 50 free casino spins. Use this link to win up to $500 in casino deposit matches and 100 free casino spins.

First things first, let’s take a quick look at how to activate this offer:

Click here for the sportsbook offer or use this link to qualify for the casino deposit match.

Apply bonus code PITTSXLM and answer the required prompts to set up a new user profile.

Using any of the secure payment methods, make a cash deposit of $10 or more.

New players who redeem the casino offer will have the chance to secure up to $500 in total bonuses. Meanwhile, new players who take the sportsbook offer can bet $5 to win $150 in bonuses.

Score $150 Bonus or $500 Casino Deposit Match

Most sportsbooks will offer one type of sign-up bonus to new players, but bet365 is taking things to the next level for Pennsylvania bettors. No matter which offer players choose, there are guaranteed bonuses on the table.

For the sportsbook offer, players only need to place a $5 bet on any game in any sport. While we expect to see a lot of interest in the NFL and MLB this weekend, this offer applies to a wide range of markets. This is a guaranteed $150 bonus for new users.

Bet365 Sportsbook Boosts for Bears vs. Texans

Bet365 Sportsbook is among the best of the best when it comes to odds boosts and other unique offers. Again, Thursday night’s Hall of Fame Game doesn’t mean much in the grand scheme of things, but it is the first opportunity for football bettors to get in on the action this season. There are already a few odds boosts available for this preseason matchup. Here is a look at a couple of the options on the table:

Over 31.0 total points and Texans to win (+260)

Over 15.5 total points in the first half and Bears to lead at halftime (+350)
